name: BillyBullet
description:
Its name is Billy Bullet. And it's angry about peace!
Left and Right buttons are used to control Billy's shoots. Space Bar confirms at the menu. These are the rules!

Billy Bullet is a little game made for the Trijam#137. The team spent approximately 3h30 each.

Game Design by Deizama and slimelvl2
Code by Deizama
Visuals by slimelvl2
SFX by slimelvl2
